mapper.select: select * from tb_cars c left join tb_carOwner o on c.carOwnerid=o.id where licensePlate = #{licensePlate}
select count(*) from tb_cars where licensePlate=#{_parameter}
select * from tb_cars b left JOIN tb_carowner c on b.carOwnerid = c.ID
select * from tb_cars b left JOIN tb_carowner c on b.carOwnerid = c.ID where b.licensePlate =#{licensePlate}
